newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan Jan zinc imports rise 11.5 pct yr/yr -- MOF.
newsitem.headline: Japan Jan zinc imports rise 11.5 pct yr/yr -- MOF.

text.p: Japan's refined zinc imports in January rose 11.5 percent to 9,089 tonnes from 8,152 tonnes in the same month a year earlier, Ministry of Finance data released on Friday showed.
Refined zinc imports 1996 were 134,798 tonnes, up 15.2 percent from 116,986 tonnes the year before.
